mapper.update: UPDATE sub_info SET sub_info_price=#{sub_info_price}, sub_info_post_string=#{sub_info_post_string}, sub_info_pre_string=#{sub_info_pre_string} WHERE sub_info_seq = 1
mapper.select: SELECT category_name FROM category JOIN user_category ON category.category_num = user_category.category_num WHERE user_category.user_id = #{user_id};

select * from (select *,@rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum from book , (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP where book_publish_date> (current_date()- INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) E where rnum>(#{page}-1)*8 AND rnum<=#{page}*8 order by book_seq
